TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ProviderSettings extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class ProviderSettings Inherits ConfigurationElement

Docs.summary: Represents the configuration elements associated with a provider.

remarks.format:
## Remarks ASP.NET uses providers to perform specific services required by a feature. For example, the membership feature uses a provider to coordinate the persistence of membership data in a database.
In a configuration file, individual providers are added to a `providers` element within a particular feature section.
The <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings> class represents a particular group of settings that are added to the `providers` element within a configuration section. Typically the configuration attributes specified by the `add` directive include a name, type, and other properties.
## Examples The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings>.
[!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ProviderSettings#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ProviderSettings/CS/ProviderSettings.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ProviderSettings#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ProviderSettings/VB/ProviderSettings.vb#1)]
The following is an excerpt of the configuration file used by the above example.
```xml <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <configuration>
<configProtectedData>
<providers> <clear /> <add name="TripleDESProtectedConfigurationProvider" type="Samples.Aspnet.TripleDESProtectedConfigurationProvider, protectedconfigurationproviderlib, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=79e01ae0f5cfc66f, processorArchitecture=MSIL" />
</providers>
</configProtectedData>
</configuration> ```

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name of the provider configured by this class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This value of the <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings.Name%2A> property is the same as the value for the `name` attribute that appears in the configuration section for the provider that is configured by the <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings> class.
## Examples The following code example shows how to access the <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings.Name%2A> property.
